name: escompose
description: A standard for transforming ES Modules into linked Web Components
author: Garrett Flynn <garrettmflynn@gmail.com>

scripts.transfer: mkdir -p src/graphscript && cp ../graphscript/Graph.ts src/graphscript && mkdir -p src/graphscript/services && cp ../graphscript/services/Service.ts src/graphscript/services && cp -r ../graphscript/services/dom src/graphscript/services && cp -r ../graphscript/services/router src/graphscript/services
